author: TravisEz13
body:
Update the release builds to sign individual binaries (done for PowerShell)

- [x] Ask our peer teams to do similar.
    - [x] PowerShellGet - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues/181
    - [x] PackageManagement / One Get - https://github.com/OneGet/oneget/issues/319
    - [x] Archive - **Only script** - https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/issues/45
title: Track peer projects implementing individual binary signing.
